Summary: Pass inputs to components via [Prop] plain properties. Chain fluent setters in the parent to configure behavior and appearance.
Remarks: MauiReactor components accept inputs through standard C# properties marked with [Prop]. In usage, create the component and chain fluent setters to assign values (e.g., .Message("Loading").IsBusy(true)). Properties are ideal for same-page composition; if configuring components created on other pages, prefer strongly-typed Props objects via navigation.
